data.title: Associate Professor of Chemistry Nan Jiang is named a Fellow of the American Vacuum Society
data.text: Congratulation to Nan Jiang, Associate Professor of Chemistry for being named a Fellow of American Vacuum Society. Fellowship recognizes AVS members who have made sustained and outstanding scientific and technical contributions in areas of interest to AVS. His award will be presented at the AVS Awards Ceremony during the AVS 69th International Symposium and Exhibition in Portland, Oregon on November 8, 2023. Nan is one of the youngest AVS Fellows and join the prestigious group which includes two of our senior colleagues, Mike Trenary and Luke Hanley.
